mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, nick_name, user_type, email, phone_number, sex, avatar_path, user_status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remark

user.user_id AS userId,user.username AS username,user.password,user.nick_name AS nickName,user.user_type AS userType,user.email,user.phone_number AS phoneNumber,user.sex,user.avatar_path AS avatarPath,user.user_status AS userStatus,user.create_by AS createBy,user.create_date AS createDate,user.update_by AS updateBy,user.update_date AS updateDate,user.del_flag AS delFlag,user.remark

role.role_id AS roleId,role.role_name AS roleName,role.role_key AS roleKey,role.role_status AS roleStatus,role.create_by AS createBy,role.create_date AS createDate,role.update_by AS updateBy,role.update_date AS updateDate,role.del_flag AS delFlag,role.remark

gr.user_group_id AS userGroupId,gr.user_group_name AS userGroupName,gr.create_by AS createBy,gr.create_date AS createDate,gr.update_by AS updateBy,gr.update_date AS updateDate,gr.del_flag AS delFlag,gr.remark
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur on user.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role role on ur.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.del_flag = 0 and user.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT
FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_info_group uig ON user.user_id = uig.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user_group gr ON uig.user_group_id = gr.user_group_id WHERE gr.del_flag = 0 and user.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT role.role_key AS roleKey FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur on user.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role role on ur.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.del_flag = 0 and role.role_status = '0' and user.user_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT role.role_key AS roleKey FROM sys_user_group ug INNER JOIN sys_user_group_role ugr on ug.user_group_id = ugr.user_group_id INNER JOIN sys_role role on ugr.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.del_flag = 0 and role.role_status = '0' and ug.user_group_id in (SELECT DISTINCT gr.user_group_id AS userGroupId FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_info_group uig ON user.user_id = uig.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user_group gr ON uig.user_group_id = gr.user_group_id WHERE gr.del_flag = 0 and user.user_id = #{userId})
